section.title: How to contact us
section.p: The best way to get in touch with us is via the dev and user mailing lists. For more information, please see Mailing Lists. You can also get directly in touch with various contributors and committers.

Castor developers and committors can also sometimes be found at the #castor IRC channel at irc.codehaus.org. You can find more information and alternate means of access to the IRC channel at our support page.
